item.title: Using Test-Driven Development for Kustomize Overlays
item.description: I am by no means a developer (not by a long shot!), but I have been learning lots of development-related things over the last several years and trying to incorporate those into my workflows. One of these is the idea of test-driven development (see Wikipedia for a definition and some additional information), in which one writes tests to validate functionality before writing the code to implement said functionality (pardon the paraphrasing). In this post, I’ll discuss how to use conftest to (loosely) implement test-driven development for Kustomize overlays.
